Title: Allows certain parties of releases and covenants involving PFAS to seek contribution from other responsible parties
Summary: Allows certain parties of releases and covenants involving PFAS to seek contribution from other responsible parties.
LawCode: Amd ยง15-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to allowing certain parties of releases and covenants involving PFAS to seek contribution from other responsible parties
